parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.68</value></part><part><name>Game Version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the path to follow for AI driver. Note that [[unitReady]] will return [[true]] even if AI is still driving through the points.<br>
Using any other ''move'' command (e.g <template><title>Inline code</title><part><name index="1"/><value>vehicleName [[move]] [[getPos]] vehicleName</value></part></template>) or [[doStop]] will stop the effect of this command. </value></part><part><name>Description</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicleName [[setDriveOnPath]] points </value></part><part><name>Syntax</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicleName: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>Parameter 1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> points: [[Array]] - list of [[Position|Positions]] to format [x,y,z] OR to format [x,y,z, speed], speed being '''in m/s'''. </value></part><part><name>Parameter 2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>Return Value</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>myVehicle [[setDriveOnPath]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[getMarkerPos]] "wp1", [[getMarkerPos]] "wp2"];</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_points = [[allMapMarkers]] [[apply]] { [[getMarkerPos]] _x; }; <template><title>codecomment</title><part><name index="1"/><value>// getting all marker positions</value></part></template>
{ [[_x]] [[pushBack]] 15; } forEach _points; <template><title>codecomment</title><part><name index="1"/><value>// setting [[speed]]</value></part></template>
myVehicle [[setDriveOnPath]] _points;</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[move]], [[forceSpeed]], [[limitSpeed]], [[Waypoint]] </value></part><part><name>See Also</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
